person.name: Bruce A. Carlson
person.description: Elder Bruce A. Carlson was sustained a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 4, 2009, at age 59. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a ward Sunday School teacher and as a member of the Military Advisory Committee. He currently serves in assignments with the Middle East / North Africa Area, North America Central Area, and Idaho Area.
